kv7.7:1.3: Sukhavedaniyā dukkhavedaniyā adukkhamasukhavedaniyā, sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, phassena sampayuttā, vedanāya sampayuttā, saññāya sampayuttā, cetanāya sampayuttā, cittena sampayuttā, sārammaṇā;
kv7.7:1.4: atthi tāya āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv7.7:1.6: nanu na sukhavedaniyā na dukkhavedaniyā na adukkhamasukhavedaniyā, na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, na phassena sampayuttā, na vedanāya sampayuttā, na saññāya sampayuttā, na cetanāya sampayuttā, na cittena sampayuttā, anārammaṇā;
kv7.7:1.7: natthi tāya āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv7.7:1.11: natthi tāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv7.7:2.1: Phasso kammavipāko, phasso sukhavedaniyo dukkhavedaniyo adukkhamasukhavedaniyo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dukkhāya …pe… adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto phassena sampayutto vedanāya sampayutto saññāya sampayutto cetanāya sampayutto cittena sampayutto sārammaṇo;
kv7.7:2.4: Pathavī kammavipāko, pathavī sukhavedaniyā dukkhavedaniyā adukkhamasukhavedaniyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dukkhāya …pe… adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā phassena sampayuttā vedanāya sampayuttā saññāya sampayuttā cetanāya sampayuttā cittena sampayuttā sārammaṇā;
kv7.7:2.5: atthi tāya āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv7.7:2.7: pathavī kammavipāko, pathavī na sukhavedaniyā na dukkhavedaniyā …pe… anārammaṇā;
kv7.7:2.10: Phasso kammavipāko, phasso na sukhavedaniyo na dukkhavedaniyo …pe… anārammaṇo;
kv7.7:4.1: Labbhā pathavī ketuṁ vikketuṁ āṭhapetuṁ ocinituṁ vicinitunti?
kv7.7:4.3: Labbhā kammavipāko ketuṁ vikketuṁ āṭhapetuṁ ocinituṁ vicinitunti?
kv7.7:9.3: Paṭhamaṁ pathavī saṇṭhāti, pacchā sattā uppajjantīti?
kv7.7:9.5: Paṭhamaṁ vipāko uppajjati, pacchā vipākapaṭilābhāya kammaṁ karontīti?
kv7.7:11.9: Cakkavattisattassa phassaṁ vedanaṁ saññaṁ cetanaṁ cittaṁ saddhaṁ vīriyaṁ satiṁ samādhiṁ paññaṁ aññe sattā paribhuñjantīti?
kv7.7:12.4: Nanu atthi issariyasaṁvattaniyaṁ kammaṁ adhipaccasaṁvattaniyaṁ kammanti?
kv7.7:12.6: Hañci atthi issariyasaṁvattaniyaṁ kammaṁ adhipaccasaṁvattaniyaṁ kammaṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
